title: 100% new 4 bed 2.5 bath with parking! Top of the line everything! July
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 301141361', 'Rent: $5,000 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2.5', 'Available Date: 07/15/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Newly constructed 4 bed 2.5 bath apartment for rent for July!', 'Huge bedrooms, high ceilings, luxury finishes with parking included!', 'This apartment literally offers it all: Central air, laundry in unit, stone countertops, stainless steel appliances, open layout, off-street parking included all in a convenient location 1 block from Trader Joes and 3 to Harvard Engineering/Harvard Business School.', 'Lower Allston is the best kept secret in the city, great for many commutes and close to it all.', 'Call to see this apartment and hear why this is a great location for you', 'FEATURES', 'Central Air', 'Close to park', 'Close to public transportation', 'Close to supermarket', 'Convenient location', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Driveway Parking', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Free laundry', 'Gas stove & dishwasher', 'Granite countertops', 'HVAC system', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Island', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Off-street parking', 'Open layout', 'Parking', 'Private laundry', 'Recessed lighting', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Shaun Ulloa', 'Sales broker', '(617) 359-0359', 'Foundation Real Estate Services']
